children.text: Meta Stats and Meta passive Text

parameters.text:

"Battery Recharge Effect: " & Battery_Effectiveness & "%" &
newline &

newline &

newline

&"Zinc Income: " & Meta_Passive_Income_Object.Meta_Passive_Zinc & newline

children.text: Reset Map Building aka BIG BERTHA
Real End Y is 468 // Demo End in 215
Tier 3 layer with Lava_1 and Stone
Tier 4 layer with Diamonds Gold and Zinc
Last layer with more Diamonds, gold and Zinc + Lava

parameters.text: "DYNAMITE - Used to destroy mining obstacles" & newline & "Max ammount: " & Dynamite_Max_Ammount
"BATTERY - Charges " & Battery_Effectiveness & "% of your max energy" & newline & "Max ammount: " & Battery_Max_Ammount
"REPAIR KIT - Repairs " & Repair_Kit_Effectiveness  &"% of your max HP" & newline & "Max Ammount: " & Repair_Kit_Max_Ammount
"TELEPORTER - Returns you back to the surface"

Tier 4 layer with Diamonds Gold and Zinc
Last layer with more Diamonds, gold and Zinc + Lava

parameters.text:
"### REMOTE MINING CO. ###"

&newline & newline &

"WELCOME MINER ! " & newline &

"Your job is to sit at home and control this remote controlled mining machine and gather resources. " &newline & 
 " Complete all the quests and you will be handsomely rewarded"

 & newline & "### OVER ### "

children.text: Narrator when reaching rocks REAL HEIGHT -50

parameters.text:
"### REMOTE MINING CO. ###"

&newline & newline & "Ohh can´t drill through that, guess you will have to use some dynamite. Do not worry explosives are cheap around theese parts of the world."

&newline & newline & "### OVER ### "

"### REMOTE MINING CO. ###"

&newline & newline &

"BTW beware of rodents, they tend to build settlements at theese depths..." & newline & newline & "I will send you some funds to help clear them out!" & newline & "### $1000 added ###" &newline & "### OVER ### "

children.text: Prevent Chager going over Max Charge = Charge bar doesnt grow too big
Prevent reload bar going over Reload Time = Reload bar doesnt grow too big
Move Miner to Center when mining starts

children.title: Enemy Spawns and Encounters HP Bar2

parameters.text:
"Collect 5x Coal:" & newline  & Quest_Objective_1 & " / " & Quest_Target_1 & newline &
"Collect 5x Quartz:" & newline & Quest_Objective_2 & " / " & Quest_Target_2 & newline &
"Collect 5x Bauxite:" & newline  & Quest_Objective_3 & " / " & Quest_Target_3
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "100 $"

"Go to WAREHOUSE and DEPOSIT" & newline &
"Deposit 5x Coal:" & newline & Quest_Objective_1 & " / " & Quest_Target_1 & newline &
"Deposit 5x Quartz:" & newline & Quest_Objective_2 & " / " & Quest_Target_2 & newline &
"Deposit 5x Bauxite:" & newline & Quest_Objective_3 & " /  "& Quest_Target_3
"Reach a depth of -15 m" & newline & Quest_Objective_1 & " / " & Quest_Target_1

"Go to the Smelter and craft 3x Aluminium Ingot and 3x Silicon" & newline &
"Aluminium Ingots Crafted:" & newline & Quest_Objective_1 & " / " & Quest_Target_1 & newline &
"Silicon  Crafted:" & newline & Quest_Objective_2 & " / " & Quest_Target_2
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "250 $"

"Go to the SHOP and BUY 5x Dynamite and 2x Battery" & newline &
"Dynamite Purchased:" & newline & Quest_Objective_1 & " / " & Quest_Target_1 & newline &
"Battery Purchased:" & newline & Quest_Objective_2 & " / " & Quest_Target_2
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "250 $"
"Reach a depth of -55 m" & newline & Quest_Objective_1 & " / " & Quest_Target_1
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "500 $"

"Go to the UPGRADES Menu and upgrade Drill Damage Multiplier and Max Energy" & newline & "Drill DMG Multiplier Tier 1: " &Meta_Drill_Upg_Button.Damage_Tier_1_Level & " / " & Quest_Target_1 & newline & "Max Energy Tier 1: "&Meta_Energy_Upg_Button.Energy_Max_Tier_1_Level & " / " & Quest_Target_2
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "500 $"

"Go to the UPGRADES Menu and upgrade Passive Mining for Coal, Quartz and Bauxite" & newline & "Passive Coal " & Meta_Passive_Upg_Button.Passive_Coal_Level & " / " & Quest_Target_1 & newline & "Passive Quartz " & Meta_Passive_Upg_Button.Passive_Quartz_Level& " / " & Quest_Target_2 & newline & "Passive Bauxite " & Meta_Passive_Upg_Button.Passive_Bauxite_Level& " / " & Quest_Target_2
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "500 $"
"Gather 2,5k $ and buy the LASER GUN!" & newline & "Sell, Craft and upgrade to gather the money. This quest is gonna take a longer time to complete"
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "750 $"
"Penetrate the Lava and defeat the enemies"
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "1000 $"
"YOU HAVE COMPLETED THE DEMO!" & newline & "You can keep mining if you want but get full game for alot more content!"
"Go deeper and defeat the next 2 enemies"
"Your Reward for completing this quest:" & newline & "2500 $"
